itunes:title: S1, E13: Are My Kids on Track: Spiritual Milestone Meaning
title: S1, E13: Are My Kids on Track: Spiritual Milestone Meaning
itunes:author: That Sounds Fun Network
itunes:subtitle: In this episode we talk about the idea of meaning or purpose, what you can do to help them discover their purpose, what you can do in your daily life to bring purpose to your kids and how to help your kids take ownership of their faith. This...
itunes:summary:
In this episode we talk about the idea of meaning or purpose, what you can do to help them discover their purpose, what you can do in your daily life to bring purpose to your kids and how to help your kids take ownership of their faith. This episode is a companion to chapter 12 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
 
Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls
Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
description:
In this episode we talk about the idea of meaning or purpose, what you can do to help them discover their purpose, what you can do in your daily life to bring purpose to your kids and how to help your kids take ownership of their faith. This episode is a companion to chapter 12 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.

 

Connect with Sissy, David and Melissa @raisingboysandgirls

Connect with Sarah @sarahwbragg or her podcast here
content:encoded:
In this episode we talk about the idea of meaning or purpose, what you can do to help them discover their purpose, what you can do in your daily life to bring purpose to your kids and how to help your kids take ownership of their faith. This episode is a companion to chapter 12 of the Are My Kids on Track book. Be sure to download the free supplemental small group questions here.
